content: My biggest regret on that regard is not growing up on a farm, as my people had for ever I guess, until my dad. I suspect that from a position of self reliance, callings would be more apparent, and we would know better how to respond. But then I wouldn’t have these children, or the grandchildren I care for. I’ve always just wanted to help. I’m trying to direct the drive initially instead of reactively. Best of luck https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:Tralfamadoran777 (my purpose)
